name: Sticky Golf (10 Games in 10 Weeks)
description:
Sticky Golf is a wacky golf game where the obstacles you hit become part of the ball!

Gather more and more objects in a slowly growing snowball, and try to reach the goal in as few strokes as possible.  Launch yourself from booster pads, bounce off of trampolines, and use the course to your advantage!

This is the Week 1 entry into my 10 Games in 10 Weeks challenge.  If you are curious about the challenge, you can read up on the details here.
